snippet.title: Blood & Glory Legend Trailer (iOS)
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON IOS AND GOOGLE PLAY!

Return to the arena and bask in the blood-hungry cheers of the crowd as you fight to become a LEGEND! 

The top-rated arena-combat game continues with Blood and Glory: Legend! Equip lethal weapons and epic armor in your quest to achieve blood-soaked victory!
